## Public Member Functions

### final() {#a5138672d89124f45e2217d8484a59a40}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MD5::final (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/md5/md5result">MD5Result</a> &amp; Result)</>}>
Finishes off the hash and puts the result in result.

Finish the hash and place the resulting hash into <code>result</code>.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Result">is assumed to be a minimum of 16-bytes in size.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h">MD5.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#l00234">234</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp">MD5.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### final() {#a6619a5c386e36ca0c518f9369083cd4b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="MD5::MD5Result MD5::final ()">
Finishes off the hash, and returns the 16-byte hash data.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h/#l00075">75</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h">MD5.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#l00264">264</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp">MD5.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### result() {#a6c6fdc9e89019b2c169fb700d64f76e4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="MD5::MD5Result MD5::result ()">
Finishes off the hash, and returns the 16-byte hash data.

This is suitable for getting the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/md5">MD5</a> at any time without invalidating the internal state, so that more calls can be made into <code>update</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h">MD5.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#l00270">270</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp">MD5.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### update() {#a3f41856aade4440631544e50238f75f5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MD5::update (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}>
Updates the hash for the byte stream provided.

Incrementally add the bytes in <code>Data</code> to the hash.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h">MD5.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#l00189">189</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp">MD5.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### update() {#a155b676479d4f275c239be608c5314ee}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MD5::update (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str)</>}>
Updates the hash for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> provided.

Add the bytes in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <code>Str</code> to the hash.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h">MD5.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#l00227">227</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp">MD5.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### body() {#aae6f25f1f0dcf310fe06de249806fe8f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const uint8&#95;t &#42; MD5::body (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}>
This processes one or more 64-byte data blocks, but does NOT update the bit counters.

There are no alignment requirements.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h/#l00105">105</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h">MD5.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp">MD5.cpp</a>.

### stringifyResult() {#a450646b00c73312350d0f0f113a860e8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MD5::stringifyResult (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/md5/md5result">MD5Result</a> &amp; Result, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; char &gt; &amp; Str)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Translates the bytes in <code>Res</code> to a hex string that is deposited into <code>Str</code>.

The result will be of length 32.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h/#l00084">84</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/md5-h">MD5.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#l00287">287</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp">MD5.cpp</a>.
